action.name: Authorize for Int
action.meta: Approved by TCRM or delegated authority

function.arg: automatic message: RFC authorized for INT

action.name: Failed Deployment to INT
action.meta: If implementation failed, it needs to go back to the RFC initiator and re-submitted

action.name: Assign to Initiator
action.meta: Release Manager will assign to Initiator after communicating on dependencies

function.arg: Automatic message: RFC authorized for TEST
automatic message : RFC authorized for PROD

action.name: Submit to eval for INT
action.meta: Submit the RFC for evaluation tor Integration
